body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
The normal providerID of OpenStack instance is like: openstack:///39d205c2-82ab-4245-bc34-8bf5c3260c33, but OpenStack cloud provider can not get instanceID from ProviderID.
Filter by:
/------------------
/# kubectl get node kube-minion-hkuuhsvxwzpy -o yaml | grep openstack
  providerID: openstack:///39d205c2-82ab-4245-bc34-8bf5c3260c33
/------------------

**What you expected to happen**:
OpenStack cloud provider can get instanceID from ProviderID.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

**Anything else we need to know?**:
Url can't parse the providerID of OpenStack instance.
My test script as follows:
/-----------
providerID := "openstack:///39d205c2-82ab-4245-bc34-8bf5c3260c33"
    parsedID, err := url.Parse(providerID)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println("%v", err)
    }
    fmt.Printf("%#v\n", parsedID)
    if len(parsedID.Host) == 0 {
        fmt.Printf("Can't get instanceID from providerID\n")
    } else {
        fmt.Printf("The instanceID is:%s\n", parsedID.Host)
    }
/-----------
run result:
/-----------
&url.URL{Scheme:"openstack", Opaque:"", User:(*url.Userinfo)(nil), Host:"", Path:"/39d205c2-82ab-4245-bc34-8bf5c3260c33", RawPath:"", ForceQuery:false, RawQuery:"", Fragment:""}
Can't get instanceID from providerID

/-----------

**Environment**:   deploy by latest codes
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Issues or PRs related to openstack provider
labels.name: area/provider/openstack

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: Url can't parse the providerID of OpenStack instance
